error-1: You should first visit the login page and click on the 'Forgot your password?' link
error-2: Check that both fields are an exact match with each other, they are between 6 to 20 characters and contain at least one numeric digit, one uppercase and one lowercase letter!
error-header: Password could not be changed because of following error(s):
success-msg: You have succesfully changed your password! Please wait to be redirected.
title: Change password
instructions: Type in your new password twice in the fields below. Password must be between 6 to 20 characters and must contain at least one numeric digit, one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
